verses.verse: But in the latter <WH319> days, <WH3117> it will happen that the mountain <WH2022> of Yahweh <WH3068>'s temple <WH1004> will be established <WH3559> on the top <WH7218> of the mountains, <WH2022> and it will be exalted <WH5375> above the hills; <WH1389> and peoples <WH5971> will stream to it. <WH5102>

Many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> will go <WH1980> and say, <WH559> "Come, <WH3212> and let us go up <WH5927> to the mountain <WH2022> of Yahweh, <WH3068> and to the house <WH1004> of the God <WH430> of Jacob; <WH3290> and he will teach <WH3384> us of his ways, <WH1870> and we will walk <WH3212> in his paths. <WH734>" For out of Zion <WH6726> will go forth <WH3318> the law, <WH8451> and the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> from Jerusalem; <WH3389>

and he will judge <WH8199> between many <WH7227> peoples, <WH5971> and will decide <WH3198> concerning strong <WH6099> nations <WH1471> afar off. <WH7350> They will beat <WH3807> their swords <WH2719> into plowshares, <WH855> and their spears <WH2595> into pruning hooks. <WH4211> Nation <WH1471> will not lift up <WH5375> sword <WH2719> against nation, <WH1471> neither will they learn <WH3925> war any more. <WH4421>

But they will sit <WH3427> every man <WH376> under his vine <WH1612> and under his fig tree; <WH8384> and no one will make them afraid: <WH2729> For the mouth <WH6310> of Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> has spoken. <WH1696>

Indeed all <WH376> the nations <WH5971> may walk <WH3212> in the name <WH8034> of their gods; <WH430> but we will walk <WH3212> in the name <WH8034> of Yahweh <WH3068> our God <WH430> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5703>

"In that day, <WH3117>" says <WH5002> Yahweh, <WH3068> "I will assemble <WH622> that which is lame, <WH6760> and I will gather <WH6908> that which is driven away, <WH5080> and that which I have afflicted; <WH7489>

and I will make <WH7760> that which was lame <WH6760> a remnant, <WH7611> and that which was cast far off <WH1972> a strong <WH6099> nation: <WH1471> and Yahweh <WH3068> will reign <WH4427> over them on Mount <WH2022> Zion <WH6726> from then on, <WH5704> even forever. <WH5769>"

You, <WH4026> tower of the flock, <WH5739> the hill <WH6076> of the daughter <WH1323> of Zion, <WH6726> to you it will come, <WH857> yes, <WH7223> the former dominion <WH4475> will come, <WH935> the kingdom <WH4467> of the daughter <WH1323> of Jerusalem. <WH3389>

Now why do you cry <WH7321> out aloud? <WH7452> Is there no king <WH4428> in you? <WH3289> Has your counselor perished, <WH6> that pains <WH2427> have taken <WH2388> hold of you as of a woman in travail? <WH3205>

Be in pain, <WH2342> and labor to bring forth, <WH1518> daughter <WH1323> of Zion, <WH6726> like a woman in travail; <WH3205> for now you will go forth <WH3318> out <WH3318> of the city, <WH7151> and will dwell <WH7931> in the field, <WH7704> and will come even to Babylon. <WH894> There you will be rescued. <WH5337> There Yahweh <WH3068> will redeem <WH1350> you from the hand <WH3709> of your enemies. <WH341>
Now many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> have assembled <WH622> against you, <WH559> that say, "Let her be defiled, <WH2610> and let our eye <WH5869> gloat <WH2372> over Zion. <WH6726>"

But they don't <WH3045> know the thoughts <WH4284> of Yahweh, <WH3068> neither do they understand <WH995> his counsel; <WH6098> for he has gathered <WH6908> them like the sheaves <WH5995> to the threshing floor. <WH1637>

Arise <WH6965> and thresh, <WH1758> daughter <WH1323> of Zion; <WH6726> for I will make <WH7760> your horn <WH7161> iron, <WH1270> and I will make <WH7760> your hoofs <WH6541> brass; <WH5154> and you will beat in pieces <WH1854> many <WH7227> peoples: <WH5971> and I will devote <WH2763> their gain <WH1215> to Yahweh, <WH3068> and their substance <WH2428> to the Lord <WH113> of the whole earth. <WH776>
